translations: 给……造址；设置（site 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 厂址选择；基地选择；位置选择
垃圾填埋场；垃圾堆填区
场地规划；地盘规划；总平面设计；总平面规划
试验场地；试验场；试验区
地盘作业；工地作业；现场施工

sentences.sentence: Discussions rumble on over the siting of the new airport.
sentences.translation: 关于新机场的选址问题，讨论起来没完没了。

sentences.sentence: There was a meeting to discuss the siting of the new school.
sentences.translation: 已开会讨论了新学校的选址。

sentences.sentence: His work as a consultant consisted in advising foreign companies on the siting of new factories.
sentences.translation: 他做顾问的工作主要包括就新工厂选址为外国公司提出意见。
